title: Mastery Learning Support Strategies Based on Flipped Learning: Simulation/VR-Enhanced Professional Education in Social Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in social sciences and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Competency-based learning process for in-service professionals in flipped VR simulation environments, incorporating BYOD for pre-learning and project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can enhance practical application skills by mastering social problem-solving scenarios through VR simulation with over 80% proficiency.
In a flipped learning environment, learners complete pre-learning content at over 90% using self-directed learning strategies.
Learners develop the ability to resolve 95% of cognitive and affective barriers through peer feedback and an AI tutoring system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
